title: Apple releases iOS 15.5 and macOS 12.4 to the public, here’s what’s new
content:
Following weeks of beta testing with developers and public testers, Apple has released the stable builds of iOS 15.5 and macOS 12.4 to everyone. These updates are rolling out right now to all users globally — as long as their devices are compatible. Unlike iOS 15.4, iOS 15.5 doesn’t include many changes. It’s a minor

The post Apple releases iOS 15.5 and macOS 12.4 to the public, here’s what’s new appeared first on XDA.
description: Following weeks of beta testing, Apple has finally released iOS 15.5 and macOS 12.4 to the public. Here's everything new in these updates.
